nodes.text: Nem'ro's Palace, known locally as Nem'ro's Lotus of Victory, was the base of operations for Hutt crime lord Suudaa Nem'ro during the Cold War. It was located in the industrial town of Jiguuna on the planet Nal Hutta. It contained all of the usual amenities of a Hutt palace, including a cantina, at least two throne rooms, guest rooms, and a beast pit.
The palace had a reputation for being a common hangout for pirates, bounty hunters, smugglers, and other disreputable criminals.
